title: IS_DISABLED_RAW_KEY_UP
content:
0x2C033875// IsDisabledRawKeyUp
BOOL IS_DISABLED_RAW_KEY_UP(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of up state.Gets if the specified rawKeyIndex is up, even if the key is disabled with DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAME.Virtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Luaif IsDisabledRawKeyUp(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is up")
end
codeBlocks:
if IsDisabledRawKeyUp(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar is up")
end
